nodes.bodyText:
I would like to switch into "error" state and inject error instead of receive records into onConsume i.e. if the interceptor is in an error state it must drop all records passed into onConsume and inject one(or one per partition) error message with all required details.
So our code can read this message and report it in a controlled way. It should be much safer from a storm point of view - i.e. produce errors on received records, instead of an uncontrolled endless restart of workers.
